column2: # This graph shows the precipitation data observed by the different stations over a span of 6 years. The correlation of pricipation over time is less clear, but there clearly are times where there is greater precipitation.
ggplot(noaa_data, aes(x = date, y = PRCP, color = station)) +
ggtitle("Daily Precipitation observed by all weather stations in MA between 2012 and 2017") +
